Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In 2000, the last time they hired a new coach, the New Orleans Saints went from a losing record to the playoffs. Now they hope new coach Sean Payton can do the same thing.
snippet: In 2000, the last time they hired a new coach, the New Orleans Saints went from a losing record to the playoffs. Now they hope new coach Sean Payton can do the same thing.
